title: X-MEN LEGACY: BACK TO SCHOOL PREMIERE HC (Hardcover)
description: It’s a new status quo for as Rogue, Gambit, Iceman, Frenzy and Rachel Summers take up their posts as teachers and protectors of Wolverine’s school &emdash; just in time to defend it from invading N’Garai! Then, Exodus returns &emdash; and he intends to mend the divide between the X-Men by any means necessary! For the first time since SCHISM, Cyclops and Wolverine’s X-Men teams come face-to-face &emdash; with explosive and disastrous results! Then: Weapon Omega is a mutant time bomb, ready to explode &emdash; and he’s just shown up on the Jean Grey School’s doorstep. Can the X-Men disarm him before he detonates and takes the school with him? And which recently returned mutant will become a full-fledged member of Wolverine’s X-Men? Collecting X-MEN LEGACY #260.1 and #261-265.
